div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die Junij
anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes nory frater et tutor legalis ut asseruit quondam
Willelmi nory fecit constituit creauit et nominauit magistrum alexandrum
thomsone dominum Johannem Strathachin vicarium de Kynnerny et Duncanum
Donaldi coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores legittimos ad prosequendum relictam
quondam dicti Willelmj nory pro Jure hereditario terrarum et bonorum heredibus
suis spectan' ac prolibus ipsius Ac agend' defendend' et prosequend'
in omnibus actionibus et querelis officium tutorie concernen' in vberiore
forma procuratorij cum omnibus terminis necessariis et oportunis et cetera
cum potestate subsciend' sub se et quolibet ipsorum vnum et plures promit
ten' de Rato et grato

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
tercio die Julij anno quo supra

The said day Jonhne' menyeis the balye In the townis nayme chargit
ale the tennentis of the furdis to decist fra the Inputtinge of cors'
nethis in the wattir and to do nor vys' nayne wthiris maner' of
fischinge that may do preiudice or skath to the fredome of the toune
bot as ald' vys' and wont was vndir the pane of law

the said day Jonhne menyeis the balye in the tovnis nayme chargit
ale the tennentis of the raik to fische nayne wthirwais bot
as vys' and wont was vndir the pane of law

The said day Jonhne colison and thomas mar' was oblist and suorne
the gret bodely aithe to stande and abid at the ordinance final decret and
Sentence of sere Jhone ruthirfurde robert blindsele and thomas prat
summissouris and amicable' compositouris chosin and suorne betuix the said partiis
anent sex squair' li' g' clamit be the said Jhone quhilkis personis
was suorne to tak the said matir to tham and gif furtht thar decret
and finale Sentence within this tolbutht within aucht dais eftir
follouing And' the said partiis was compunctit and Jugis suorne
in the sikirast wis' of compromis' ale excepcionis and dilaciounis secludit

The saide day Alexander mathesone and thomas mar' was oblist and
suorne the gret bodelie aithez to stande and abide at the ordinance
finale decret and sentence of thir personis vndir writin Androw murray eldar
Alexander gray Dauid prat Robert crage and William andirsone arbitoris
and summissouris chosin anent the Some of xviij li' vsual money
of Scotlande follouit and clamit be the saide alexander apon the said
thomas

The saide day Androw branche In presence of Jonhne malisone his
party offerit him redy to do and fulfill ale thingis that he was
ordanit be ane assis' eftir the tenor' of the ak of thar deliuer
ance maid tharapone obefor

the said day Katy buchane falyet in the preif anent the schryne
pertening to th Androw ancroft for the quhilkis the said schryne was
adiugit to him becaus' scho falyeit in hir preif

The said day the ballieis with consent of batht the partiis assignit
monunday cum viij dais to the relict of ranald' talyour to ansuer'
to thomas prat perempturlie for v markis of ane butht maile cla
myt be the said thomas

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die Julij
anno quo supra

head.add: the the mastiris of the raik and the wattiris

div.p:
the said day comperit befor the balyeis diuers' of the tennentis of the
wattiris of mydchingile pottis and furdis with thomas prat thar
forspekar ande complenyeit that thai war hurt and iniurit be the
mastiris and tennentis of the raik and thar seruandis that thai fischit
betuix the bekninnyis in wthir placis than aucht and wont was
to thar dampnage and skathtis Ande sere Jhone Culan aldirman sere Jhon'
ruthirfurde robert blinsele Jonhne Knollis and Jhone colison thare
forspekar cleid the court for tham self and denyit the fischingis betuix
the beknnyngis and denyit ale wrange and awouit the fischinge
in the pokraw and the raik with vys' and wont with the perell of
law offeringe thame redy to vndirly the decisione of ane assis'
furtht with but delay Ande the saidis thomas prat with his fallouis
said thai walde fall in nay pley and protestit for remede of law
and passit tharway Ande the saide Jonhne colisone for him and his
saide fallowis fande ane borghe' in the handis of Duncan straloche seriand'
that thar complant was of nane avale becaus' thai war redy to
vndirly the decisione of ane assis' and thar party passit avay obefor
the strekin of the said borghe and askit warde of the court Ande
Androw culan the balye offerit him redy to minister Justice to batht
the partiis Ande becaus' thar was bot iij personis for the tyme and
the tothir party nocht present to the recounter the said borghe' the court
for waknes coud' nocht warde In the saide matir becaus' the said
action' was gretis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo Julij anno quo supra

the samyn day Jonhne Culan the aldirman grantit him pait be the handis
of Androw mureson of tua barrelis of Salmond' acht to him in ane ak
maid tharapon obefore

the saide day Kathrine prat the relict of thomas chamer grantit hir
pait of xxxv s' and ij d' be the handis of Androw muresone acht to
hir for a part of ane schip callit the nicholes'

div.head:
Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem
Dauid quhit
div.p:
Alexander rede thomas prat Johannes Wormet Dauid mathesone Johannes
Stheuinsone Alexander angousone Richardus hile pater Symon
gardin Robertus crage thomas rollande Willelmus andirsone
senior Dauid prat Jacobus crake Andreas philp et Andreas
mureson' Jurati dicunt quod quondam Robertus quhit auus Dauid quhit
latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis sanclar' ex boreali ex vna et terras quas
Andreas smitht et Johannes loremar' Inhabitant ex australi partibus ex altera
et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens Et quod dictus Dauid
est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam auj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
Et quod est legittime etatis et valet per annum xx s' et nunc existit in manibus
domini nostri regis per dimidium annj aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum
minime prosequentis et cetera

The saide say Walter auchneywe producit ane chartir contening an the
sesin in the samyn of half ane forlande liande in the nethirkirkgate
bocht fra the wyf of James robertsone in Kincardin the quhilk
chartir beinge rede was admittit in Jugement and the tennentis to
obey the saide Walter tharintill eftir the tenor' of the saide chartir

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die Julij
anno quo supra

the saide day Jonhne Steuarte follouit Duncan colisone for the
wranguis' hurtinge and strubulance of him throw forthocht
fellone the quhilkis the saide Duncan opinly denyit Ande in
continent the saide actione was putt to the decisione of ane assis'
of thir personis vndir writin chosin and suorne with consent of batht the
saide partiis that is to say Androu branche Dauid matheson Alexander
angousone thomas Waus Alexander chamer Androw mureson' thomas
narne William Wormet William nicholsone Jonhne lundoris henry
Crage Richerd hill eldar Robert ewynsone thomas rollande
and Dauid spens' quhilkis riplie avisit deliuerit and fande be the
moutht of the saide Androw branche the saide Duncan quyt of
al strubulance and of thochfellone of the saide Jhon' steuarte

the samyn day the saide Jonhne Steuarte follouit thomas prat
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xxij barrellis of ays' quhilkis
the saide thomas denyit Ande in continent the saide actione was
put to the decisione of the saide assis' quhilkis riplie avisit
the richtis resonnis and allegacionis of bath the said partiis herde and
vndirstandin deliuerit and fand the saide thomas prat quyt
of the saide xxiij barrelis of ays' be the moutht of Androw branche
forspekar of the saide assis' Ande gevin for the dome be the moutht
of Jhone' Williamsone dempstar of the Courte

The samyn day patrik rede deponit the gret aithe that the aldirman
ballieis consale and communite hed' nay Interes' nor gaf nay charge nor'
commavnde in preuay nor in pert nor wyst nocht of the gevin of the
wrang mesour' to the mettinge of the franchmennis quhet
nor hed' nay wyt tharof
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxmo die Julij anno quo supra

the saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurde fand a borghe in the hande of
philp Dunbrek officiar' of this court that Jonhne Culan aldirmane
wranguislie and aganis the law has fischit and Intromettit with ane
demi nethis fischingis of the mydchingill pertening to him quhilk
he has in take in the generale assedacion of this tone and wrangwisle
haldis fra him the fische and proffitis of the samyn quhilkis borghe
was continevit be the ballies for waknes of the Court to monun
day that next cummis but preiudice till ony party in siclik strintht
force and effect as it is this day and batht the partiis present
personaly and warnit to the saide monunday

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Julij
Anno quo supra

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurde and William blinsel his forspekar
requirit and askit Jonhne of Culane the aldirman to ansuer' to
the borghe' strekit vpone him for the wranguis' fischinge and
Intrometinge with ane half nethis fischinge of the mydchingill
pertening et cetera to him Ande the saide aldirman askit ane lauchfull
day to ansuer to the saide burghe' Ande the saide William forspekar
to the saide knicht fand' ane borghe' In the hande of philp Dunbrek
officiar' that the saide aldirman aw to haue nay langar day to
ansuer' to the saide borghe' for his saide tak nay he sulde do
haue to ansuer for the kingis malys Ande the saide ballieis
with avys' of the haill court has continevit the saide borghe'
in siclik force and effect as it is this day but preiudice
till ony party to this day xv dais Ande has assignit the
saide aldirman to ansuer' to sere Jhonez' borghe' strekit
vpone him obefor for the wranguis' Intrometinge
and fischinge of the saide demi nethis fischez of mydchin
gill Ande gif the aldirman desiris a langar delay or day
to ansuer to the saide borghe' thane the saide borghe' strekit
be the saide William sale haue ane decisione gif he aw
to haue ony langar day of law

The sext day of august the yer' within writin In presence of ane Reuerende
fadir in god Williame bischop of Abirdene thomas fyf and Jonhne menyeis
tua of the ballieis of Abirdene the decisione of the borghe' strekit be sere Jonhne
ruthirfurde of tarlane apon Jonhne Culan aldirman for the wranguis' fischeinge
of half nethis fische of the midchingile with consent of batht the said partiis
was continevit to Wednisday eftir the law day to haue ane next eftir follo
and' the fest of Sanct michael immediate eftir follouing the date of this
ak that day to haue ane finale decisione of law within the tolbutht of
abirdene befor' the officiaris of the samyn Ande the fische in the meyn' tyme
of the said' demi nethis to remane stile and the tothir demi nethis fische diuisit for
mastir Androw cadiow quhilkis the said aldirman fischit sal ly in the factis
vndiuisit and vnpakit bot soueraly kepit to the said day quhil it be
knavne quha hes richt to thame but ony dilatoris fraude or gile
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo die Augusti anno quo supra

the said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' William blinsele
forspekar that philp clerk sal pay to thome gardinar xxv s' for certan
vnyonis and ciboys' bocht fra him

the saide day Alexander chamer yongar offerit him redy to preyf that he pait his
wattir maile the first yer' that he entirit in the office of Abbat of bonacorde
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvj die augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die Andreas smitht amerciatur pro perturbio thome Jerdane cuj emendabit
vt Jura volunt et Idem thomas amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Andree cuj emenda
bit vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Andreas smitht adiudicatur in amerciamento Curie pro perturbacio vxoris thome
Jerdane cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes smitht adiudicatur in amerciamento Curie pro perturbio thome Jerdane
cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Walterus atkin deuenit plegius legalis quod Andreas smitht
et Johannes smitht erunt Indempnes pro thoma Jerdan' aliter quam per viam
Juris / Andreas branche deuenit plegius legalis quod thomas Jerdane erit Indemp
nis pro Johanne smitht aliter quam per viam Juris et thomas smitht deuenit plegius
legalis quod thomas Jerdane erit Indempnis pro Andrea smytht aliter quam per viam
Juris

Eodem die thomas smitht deuenit plegius ad intrandum Andream smytht
coram ballivis feria sexta ad quindenam ad emendandum offensionem commissam
vxori thome Jerdane

Eodem die Alexander logy deuenit plegius legalis quod Andreas smytht et Johannes smytht
erunt Indempnes pro Johanne logy filio suo aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die augusti anno quo
supra

The samyn day Jonhne Culane the aldirman present his compt
closit vndir his signet of his resat and discharge ande expens'
of this yer' of his office of aldirmanschipe to the ballieis In presence
of diuers' of the consale and askit auditouris to be chosin and suorne tharto
and thai saide it was nocht the vys' to tak his the aldirmannis
compt vnto the tyme he be dischargit of his office of aldirman
schipe quhilkis compt was put in the commone kyst of the saide
burghe' in kepin

The said day comperit Androw culane yongar abbat of bonacorde and
askit at the aldirman and ballieis ande diuers' of the consal present for
the tyme pament of his fee promittit to him as vthiris hed obefor'
quhilkis ansuerd thai coud fynde nay way to pay him quhil
he hede seruit it furtht the yer' and he protestit for remede of law

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Robert blinsele
forspekar that copin grevin factour to Jonhne Damar' portar of brugis sal
caus' a tentywe Certificacion cum fra the said Jonhne in the erast schipis
falyeinge of ane / In ane vthir cumand' to abirdene eftir his cumin to the feir'
that the said Jhon' hed j pety quartar of Salt in his schip callit the
Katherin of the veris quhilkis come within the havin of Abirdene in the
monetht of maij last bigane to haue bene deliuerit to James
Crak and he hes deliuerit it And gif the said copin falyeis in the
bringyne or sendinge of the said certificacion as said is he sal
pay j pety quartar of Salt to Walter auchneywe and vthiris merchandis
having richt tharto

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos tercio die septembris
anno quo supra

The samyn day comperit Dauid mathesone and schew how that Jonhne
of Culan aldirman hed fundin ane borghe' apone him that he wrang
uislie withhaldis fra him certan gold ringis and this day was assignit
to him to ansuer to the saide borghe' Ande becaus' the said Jonhne
nor his procuratouris comperit nocht to follow the saide borghe' the said Dauid
fand' ane borghe in the hande of thome Jamesone officiar' that he was
quyt of the saide Jonhnis challance vnto the tyme he be fastnyt
with new Soyt

Eodem die Dauid mathesone fecit constituit et creauit Alexandrum chamer
de murchill et Willelmum blinsell coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores legittimos ad
prosequendum et defendendum In omnibus actionibus causis et debatis inter
ipsum et Johannem Culan prepositum debatabilibus promitten' de Rato et grato
In vberiore forma procuratorij

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Andreas simsone
est legittimus filius et heres quondam Johannis Symsone burgensis de Abirdene
Igitur precipitur thome fyf ballivo ad cognoscendum ipsum ad terras suas
ut decet filium et heredem burgensis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die septe
mbris Anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid mathesone exposuit qualiter nauiga
turus erat versus limites marinos et si medio tempore ante
venentum suum viam vniuerse carnis ingredi contigerit tnuit tenuit
assignauit piscarias suas dimidii rethis de midchingile Elene
g lilburne sponse sue cum partis suis in vberiore forma assignatis

Eodem die copin grevin et Willekin opidanj de Weeris prose
quebantur Robertum blinsele et thomam prat pro naulo vasto eo quod
non imposuerunt mercimonia promissa in opido edanensis secundum tenorem
carte Indenture inter ipsos confect' quod dicti Robertus et thomas denegarunt
et consequenter de consensu vtriusque partis huiusmodi actio ponita fuit assisa proborum
virorum ad hoc Juratorum quj mature auisiata corpabilibus prestitis
Juramentis decreuerunt ipsos quitos de calumpniam dictorum copin et
Willekin penes clameum huiusmodi nauli Robertum autem similiter exoneratum
et dictum thomam exoneratum ex et pro eo quod mercator suus nomine suo vnam
lastam bonorum in nauim imponj perobtulit quondam dictus Willekin recipere
noluit infra nauim antedictam

the xiiij day of September the yer befor writin It was
deliuerit and ordanit be the mastir of Sanct nicholes' werk and
diuers of the consall present for the tyme for the gude of the werk
and vnite ande concorde to Judcire amang the masonis that Androw
murray and thome of barvy masonnis sal stande in
ayfalde tendirnes and concorde as efferis in tymes to cum
Ande gif ony of thame iniuris distrubulis or Inquietis
vthiris and beis conuikit tharintill sal pay xl s' of thar fee
to the said' werk vnforgewin to the quhilk be the
said partiis was oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar
handis vphaldin Alsua gif thar happinnis ony discripance
or discord amang ony of the masonnis of the luge thai
sal complenye to the mastir of the werk for remede
Ande quhay say dois nocht sal pay xl s' of his fee
to the said' kirk werk to the said' thingis to be kepit
and fulfillit And' vnite and concord to be obseruit amang
thame thai ar' oblist be the fathtis of thar' bodiis
thar handis vphaldin
